data.title: Top Private School in Virginia Beach VA
data.meta_description: Cape Henry Collegiate is the top prekindergarten to grade 12 independent, college-preparatory private school in Virginia Beach, Virginia. Inquire today!
data.text:
Alumni

Athletics

Cape Henry Collegiate is honored to welcome Mr. Devon Hall ‘13 into the Athletic Hall of Fame. A silky-smooth point guard and consummate captain, Mr. Hall’s basketball journey has been nothing short of exemplary.

Find Out More about Introducing the Newest Member of CHC's Athletic Hall of Fame

Alumni

Nexus Global Studies

In just five years after graduating, Fiona Clunan ‘19 has achieved significant milestones, underscoring the role of her formative experiences at Cape Henry Collegiate in her success—and she is just getting started.

Find Out More about Fiona Clunan ‘19: From Nexus to Stanford Law School

Academics

CHC Giving

Cape Henry’s newest campus addition is part of a proud tradition of looking toward the future and embracing change.

Find Out More about Celebrating the Grand Opening of the Clarke+Ervin Center for Innovation and Performing Arts

Community Outreach

Upper School

Ballers is a league for kids with unique abilities to come together and play basketball. Parents of special needs children are often the ones who have to help their kids, so I made it my goal to have my friends from the community step up during practice to assist.

Find Out More about Community Connections: CHC Student Creates Special Needs Basketball League

Academics

Community

Over their combined eight decades of teaching, Mr. Ed Faubert and Mrs. Carolyn Scullion influenced the lives of hundreds of students. Their tenure and towering legacies are such that it is difficult to imagine Cape Henry Collegiate without them – and yet, this spring, both are retiring.

Find Out More about Decades of Dedication: Honoring the Legacy of Two Retiring Educators
